mapper.select: select board_seq, title, content, viewcount, b.category_seq category ,b.img img, b.insert_date insert_date, u.user_seq user_seq, u.nickname nickname, c.main main, c.middle middle, c.sub sub, c.detail detail from board b JOIN user u ON b.user_seq = u.user_seq JOIN category c ON u.category_seq = c.category_seq order BY board_seq desc LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select board_seq, title, content, viewcount, b.category_seq category ,b.img img, b.insert_date insert_date, u.user_seq user_seq, u.nickname nickname from board b JOIN user u ON b.user_seq = u.user_seq where board_seq = #{boardSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, insert_date, img, user_seq, category_seq) values(#{title}, #{content}, now(), #{img}, #{userSeq}, #{categorySeq})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, insert_date= now(), img=#{img}, category_seq=#{categorySeq} where board_seq=#{boardSeq}
mapper.select: select board_seq, title, content, viewcount, b.category_seq category ,b.img img, b.insert_date insert_date, u.user_seq user_seq, u.nickname nickname, c.main main, c.middle middle, c.sub sub, c.detail detail from board b JOIN user u ON b.user_seq = u.user_seq JOIN category c ON u.category_seq = c.category_seq where title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order BY board_seq desc
